one_reviews_text: This is probably the best card game you can get for Oculus right now. It's easy to read the cards and easy to play. The AI is excellent and you can also play VS. against people on other versions of the game. My big complaint is that the DLC purchased in the identical tablet version doesn't transfer into this game. It also crashes sometimes, not so much anymore, but it picks up right where it was when you restart.

review_title: Super Cool Space Conquest Card Game!
one_reviews_text: The interface looks nice and the game is fun. My hands look really cool! The Avatars are neat as well. No problems running the game. =)

Purchased, downloaded, installed, but does not run. Posted a message in the forum, got no response. Sent a letter to the maker, and still no reply.  Hard to justify anything more than a single star when I can't get so much as a single screen to appear.
